meanings.definition: A sweet alcoholic drink made from fruit juice and brandy.
meanings.sent1: During the celebration, guests enjoyed sipping on the homemade ratafia.
meanings.sent2: The bartender served a glass of ratafia to the customer at the fancy party.
meanings.sent3: The ratafia was so delicious that it made everyone dance like they were at a party.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter bubbled up like a glass of ratafia, spreading joy around the room.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of the ratafia filled the room, tempting everyone to take a sip.
